attributes.action: Call for All Energy Providers to offer free Gas And Electricity due to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: As we are on a nationwide lockdown our energy usage has increased dramatically so this is a call from the Nation as British Gas ,E-on, Edf Energy or any Energy Provider has not been in the news for providing any Kind support for Covid-19 as this should be made mandatory for Worldwide Pandemic
attributes.background: Introduce an Emergency Legislation For all energy providers to offer free or lowered cost electricity & gas due to this Covid-19 Pandemic Crisis

rejection.details:
Suspending payments for utilities is a matter for individual utility providers, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you want the Government to encourage lenders, landlords and utilities to freeze payments during lockdown, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

If you would like the Government to Reduce the price cap of gas and electricity during the UK Lockdown, you may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312363

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
